mapper.insert: insert into sys_user(username, password, nickname) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{nickname})
INSERT INTO sns.sys_user_role(id, user_id, role_id) SELECT NULL, (SELECT user_id FROM sns.sys_user WHERE username = #{username}), (SELECT role_id FROM sns.sys_role WHERE rolename = 'User')
mapper.select: SELECT r.rolename AS name FROM sys_role r INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON r.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT p.permission_name FROM sys_user u JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN sys_role r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id JOIN sys_role_permissions rp ON r.role_id = rp.role_id JOIN sys_permissions p ON rp.permission_id = p.permission_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId}
